# Update field mapping for custom fields

Learn how to update field mappings for custom fields by navigating to the appropriate tabs and editing the mapping relations.

To update a field mapping for a custom field, do the following:

1.  Navigate to the tab corresponding to the object on which you want to update field mapping:

    -   Booking Template tab for the Booking Transaction object

    -   Billing Template tab for the Billing Transaction object


2.  Navigate to the Custom Fields section.
3.  Navigate to the field mapping line that you want to update and click the edit icon. icon. ![EditFieldMapping.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/f8bee2b4-0461-45d7-b41a-51eb5200aaa6?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..tfJBSYudSvAPlJaIEnCbywtYtCBqmMljf9wk0cYmdnc) The field mapping line is displayed in the updating mode. ![EditMappingLine.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/6377fd1f-9b30-4076-b32b-902bd8baadfc?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..QZ86MrL9hLYc4Yz8QZp27NJisT-aMnurtii_MvEmA7Q)
4.  Edit the mapping relation by selecting the proper values for each of the following dropdown fields in the field mapping line:

    -   Source Billing Object
    -   Source Billing Field
    -   Target Revenue Field

5.  Click the save icon to save your changes.
